org.integratedmodelling.thinklab.api.modelling
Interface IDataSource.Transformation

Enclosing interface:
IDataSource
public static interface IDataSource.Transformation

Tag interface to construct transformation objects that produce a datasource from another during context mediation. Such transformation may change the underlying representation of the data or subset/resample it to adapt to a different, compatible context.

Author:
Ferdinando Villa
